Lunarpine smelled the dripping blood and knew that he had to get Ice 
back to base quickly. He caught another scent on the wind, another 
wolf. He knew how to handle this though. He snarled loudly as a sign 
to the scavenger that this was his prize. He knew from pack instincts 
that the other wolf would recognize Lunarpines size strength, and 
health as a sign of dominance. Ice wasn't on the menu tonight.


The clean up drones continued to take care of the virus infected 
blood. Lunarpine watched as they dusted through his footprints 
cleaning up all traces of blood. "I don't know if you know this or 
not but you just came close to ending us all." He knew he was immune, 
he also knew that if the virus would've gotten out that every faction 
on this tiny little world would hunt them down and force them to 
share the same fate.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Ice::
> 
> She growled slightly as she was picked up. Her mind went into a 
semi 
> dream state.  The virus was still changing her in some ways.  Her 
> telepathic abilities were getting stronger. She heard what 
Lunarpine 
> was thinking, but not reacting to it.  In her dream state, she 
could 
> see through Lunarpine's mind and sees.  She saw him carrying her 
and 
> knew he was taking her back to the base.  She heard his curious 
mind 
> wondering what had happened to her.  She thought about it herself 
and 
> couldn't quite find the answers.  She just knew that the matrix 
> wanted it this way and she would just have to live with it.
> 
> Her shoulder was dripping blood down onto Lunarpine. Even in her 
> sleep, she could smell the blood. She didn't like th smell of it at 
> all.  
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Lunarpine thought he'd heard something, no someone calling to 
> > him. "What was that?" He wondered, smelling the air again. He 
> > followed the scent to her. He could still hear her words in his 
> head 
> > when she called to him. "What's become of you?" He thought, 
> curiosity 
> > flooding his mind.
> > 
> > He heard a voice over his comm. Veratis wanted an update on the 
> > situation. "I found her" he replied, getting her back was going 
to 
> be 
> > the diffivult part.
> > 
> > Three clean up drones aproached scanning her. A needle came out 
of 
> > the first one and headed for Ice. 
> > 
> > "No" Lunarpine yelled as he grabbed hold of it, It was trying to 
> > neutralise the virus. He knew that if that happened she'd be 
dead. 
> > Veratis reprogrammed 2 of the drones to help get her back. 
> Lunarpine 
> > picked Ice up on his back and with the help of the drones began 
> > carrying her back.
> > 
> >
